data.password: Password (default: PIN code on the back)

deprecated_yaml.title: The D-Link Smart Plug YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring D-Link Smart Plug using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the D-Link Power Plug YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
